title: Interpretation of seeing salmon in a dream

Buying salmon in a dream indicates good luck and wealth that the dreamer will bring. Eating salmon in a dream indicates a loving and strong person. The interpretation of cooking salmon in a dream indicates abundance of nutrition and business that will have many profits. Salmon indicates freedom from problems and worries. Seeing salmon fishing in a dream means good and happy news. The interpretation of cutting salmon in a dream explains the wealth that the dreamer obtains. Cutting salmon in a dream indicates the end of problems and worries. Salmon in a person's dream means getting rid of diseases. Seeing salmon indicates comfort and a new life. What is the interpretation of seeing salmon in a dream for a single woman? title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing mirrors in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman if she sees her sister or a woman in the mirror? It is said that she gave birth to a girl similar to the one she saw. The meaning of seeing broken mirrors? It means a collapse of feelings and can indicate dissatisfaction with oneself. What is the interpretation of seeing station mirrors for a married person? It means The intense pain and troubles that he will face in the near future. What does it mean to see mirrors of pure gold? This is the wealth that you obtain. What is the interpretation of seeing mirrors of a prisoner? It means liberation and freedom soon. Interpretation of a dream about mirrors Seeing mirrors means that you are similar in events and actions, that is, you are not Learn from your previous mistakes. Mirrors for a pregnant woman mean the birth of a woman because they are a reflection of her feminine image. A married man who has a pregnant wife and sees himself in the mirrors means that he is pregnant with a boy. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing her sister or a woman in the mirror, this means that she will give birth to a girl who resembles the image she saw. Dreaming about mirrors means a life partner if the dreamer is married. If you only see your face in mirrors, it means competition and quarrels with others in life. Seeing a dream about cleaning mirrors. Interpretation of a dream about mirrors in a dream for a single woman brings life to the dreamer and his image. If you dream that you are cleaning mirrors, you need To modifications to your appearance, for example, if you are experiencing financial difficulties and need help from others in finding a job. Or borrowing from another person and so on. Cleaning mirrors means that you will be subjected to persecution and excessive criticism from others. Perhaps others have the right to this criticism, so You must take a hard look at yourself and be honest with yourself about your faults. Trying to correct this mistake stems from stinginess or vanity and hypocrisy so that you do not lose those around you. Interpretation of a dream about broken mirrorsInterpretation of a dream about broken mirrors means a collapse of feelings and may indicate dissatisfaction with oneself. Fixed mirrors for a woman A married woman means that her husband is leaving her, or that she is in a major quarrel with him or her husband’s family. Repairing mirrors for a married woman means severe pain and problems that he will face in the near future. Interpretation of seeing broken mirrors means hostility between friends or between family. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of mirrors: A gift is worthy of praise in a dream If the mirrors are beautiful, this means the money you will get, and if the woman in the dream is a virgin, this means her marriage soon. If she is married, then the gift of mirrors indicates the return of the absent person from his travels, like broken or cloudy mirrors. It means disturbance in your life from opponents or People who cause you fatigue and discomfortIt may mean that you need to further develop yourself, to accept a new job or have good opportunities in the futureBecause the mirrors are impure and poor, it means that you are not ready now for successful experiences. Seeing mirrors in a dreamIf the mirrors are pure gold , this is the wealth that you obtain. Interpretation of a dream about a prisoner’s mirrors means his release and gaining freedom soon. A single person who looks in mirrors means a close marriage. If you see in the mirror

title: Secrets of interpreting groceries in a dream by Ibn Sirin in different situations

preview.html: Some people are forced to interpret groceries in a dream, as they are strange dreams that do not indicate whether they are good or bad, and the dreamer may worry about seeing them because he did not understand their meaning, whether they are negative or positive, and dreams in general are everything that a person sees during sleep and their meaning is that All the feelings and energies latent in a person come out, through which he can express himself, discover himself and understand what reality cannot explain or communicate directly. Dream interpretation scholars analyze the vision of grocery stores in a large or small place, the goods, the human communication between the seller and the buyer and the money with which the purchase is made, and all of these are only predictions of other realistic issues, so going to the grocery store means that you are in urgent need of something. What and what you lack, and all types of goods indicate your requirements and desires that you want to obtain, and the money that you pay is the effort required of you to obtain these things, and they can have another meaning, which is that they are the obstacle between you and everything you want to achieve, so the interpretation of groceries in a dream varies according to the condition of the fortuneteller and is divided Narrator to: Interpretation of grocery stores in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees herself entering a grocery store alone, this is evidence that several grooms will come to propose to her at the same time, causing her confusion among them. And if she sees that she has chosen a type of fruit or vegetable and it is fresh, Then the money was paid, as this indicates the best groom that she will choose and that he is the most suitable for her, and this marriage will take place, God willing. But if the girl sees that she has chosen an immature fruit or vegetable, this means that she will make a bad choice in the person she will marry. And if she sees that she is in the company of Any of her family members, such as the mother and father, this indicates that her marriage will be easy and agreed upon by all parties. Interpretation of groceries in a dream for a married woman: The grocery store and all the goods in it indicate the abundance of goods and the wide diet that the woman can eat. When she sees the store, she appears Her psychological state reveals the true extent of her satisfaction with her life. If she sees a large grocery store full of fruits and vegetables, this indicates her happiness in her life. But if the grocery store is small and not in good condition, this indicates that she is missing a lot to be happy and needs to rearrange her accounts. And if A married woman sees that she is buying dates, this is good news because she will become pregnant soon or she is pregnant and has not discovered it yet, because dates are the best food for a pregnant woman. If a woman sees that she has entered one of the large stores, and not a small grocery store, but rather a store that sells all the necessary things that a person needs, then this It means that her situation will improve and money will become abundant. To enjoy a decent life. Interpretation of groceries in a dream for a man: If a man sees that he needs something, so he goes to the grocery store and finds it closed, this indicates that his desire will not be fulfilled, and that he will not achieve his goals. At the same time, it is a sign that the dreamer must be patient and consider C

title: Secrets of interpreting love in a dream by Ibn Sirin Watermelon in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, we show you the interpretation of love in a dream according to what the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin explained in his book, his dream is to eat watermelon, buy it, or see it in different colours. Interpretation scholars say that this vision varies in meaning according to the dreamer’s social status, and that is why we will explain it to you through: Encyclopedia paragraphs that follow the interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream for a single, married, and pregnant girl. Women.Interpretation of love in a dream about watermelon in a dream. Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If the sleeper sees in his sleep large numbers of cardamom fruits in the house, this is a sign of the death of one of the people of that house, and God alone knows the time. Seeing green cardamom fruits in a dream means That God will grant the dreamer good health and protect him from any hidden illness. Seeing a gift of watermelon in a dream means that there is a state of love and a strong relationship between the dreamer and the person to whom he gave the watermelon. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is eating watermelon seeds, this is a sign that his son is not fair. With him. Eating sweet watermelon in a dream portends the dreamer’s health and well-being. Cutting watermelon in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing cut watermelon in a dream for an unmarried girl portends many good things that await her. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating beans as they grow, This is a sign of the livelihood that she will gain. If she is not on time, this indicates the emergence of problems and difficulties in her life. Eating watermelon in one person’s dream indicates good luck and success. If an unmarried girl sees a large watermelon in her dream, this is a sign of She will soon marry a man who has a high status in society. Interpretation of a dream about yellow watermelon for a married woman: Seeing a yellow watermelon in a married woman’s dream indicates that she cares about her beauty and appearance. If a married woman sees a watermelon in her dream, this indicates a lot of money and great wealth. If you see a tablet Honey in a married woman’s dream means that she will become pregnant soon. If a married woman sees that she is eating a watermelon, this is a sign of losing the sorrows and worries that she suffers from. If a married woman sees a red watermelon in her dream, this is a sign of good offspring and that she will have children who will honor her and obey her. Interpretation of love in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a honeycomb in her dream, this is a sign that she will give birth in the near future. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that God will give birth to a woman for her. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she She eats watermelon and its taste is sweet, so this is a sign of an easy and trouble-free birth, so this vision promises health and well-being for her and her child. In general, seeing watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream is a praiseworthy dream that heralds good connections for her. Interpretation of a dream about green watermelon in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that Green watermelon in a dream indicates a wife or children. Seeing green watermelon in a dream means that the dreamer will be protected from illness and that God will grant him health and well-being.

title: Interpretation of seeing a person in a dream often

preview.html: This is the interpretation of seeing a person often in a dream. One of the strange things that happens to a person is that he often sees a specific person, whether he knows him or not, in his dream. Questions revolve in his mind about who this person is, why I dream of him in particular and why he is repeated in my dream, then he tries to search for an interpretation of this dream, and we will show you in the following lines Encyclopedia of dream interpretation to see a specific person in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a person in a dream oftenRepeating seeing a person in a dream Psychology Whoever sees a specific person in a dream, and there is no knowledge between them in reality, or there is no relationship between them and this is the reason for seeing him in a dream, psychologists interpret this type of dream as the emergence of psychological communication between them. From the seer and the person who repeats in his dream, because the person who repeats in his dream thinks a lot about the dreamer and it is likely that a strong friendship will develop between them. Repeating the dream of someone I know is a single thing. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream someone she knows a lot, this dream indicates that the girl has feelings for this person and wants to have a husband in the future, but she cannot tell him about her desire. And if she sees that she dreams that someone she knows gives her a gift, and this dream is repeated more than once, this dream is a warning to this girl that this person wants evil for her, and it is also a symbol that there will be many differences between them and the friendly relations that were between them will eventually end in hostility and hatred. And a single girl sees a specific person in her dream that he ignores her and repeats this dream, it means that this person will do things to her that will hurt her and make her sad, and it is a sign of this person’s care and distrust. Repeating a dream about a specific person for a married woman If a married woman often sees in her dream that her husband gives her gifts, then this dream symbolizes that this woman will be pregnant during the year in which she saw this The vision, and the husband's gift means pregnancy. And if she repeated in her dream that women from her relatives or friends ignore her, then this dream is one of the dreams that do not bode well, as it was said in the interpretation of this dream that there will be enmity between this woman and. And others and her enemies will defeat her, which will make her fall into severe sadness and anxiety and suffer from psychological pain for a long time. And if she sees that the one ignoring her is a young man she does not know, then this vision also does not bode well, as it indicates that there is someone who will exploit this woman and make her lose her money and change her. A country in distress after prosperity, and God knows best. I repeatedly dream of a person I hate. Dream interpretation scholars say that whoever sees in a dream a person he hates and sees him repeatedly in a dream, these dreams are interpreted as the dreamer hiding a certain secret and fears revealing his secret. The secret and consequences of the matter if it is revealed, which causes him severe anxiety and tension, which his mind translates into an image of a person he hates, whose image is repeated in the dream with him. It has been said that seeing a person you hate very much in a dream and makes you feel uncomfortable while you are sleeping is a symbol of disagreements.

title: Interpretation of a dream about killing a cockroach by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about killing a cockroach in a dream is one of the disturbing and exciting visions for some people, as the cockroach is considered a disgusting and frightening insect for many people, but when the dreamer sees cockroaches in a dream, it can have good and undesirable meanings depending on the components of the vision and the fortune teller’s reaction. Let us tell you. With the most important different interpretations related to the dream of killing cockroaches in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about killing a cockroach. The interpretation of seeing a cockroach being killed in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will stay away from all the people who hate and hate him. If you see this dream for an engaged girl, this may indicate that she will separate from her fiancé because he is a draining person. Her love and feelings towards her. If the dreamer is a young, unmarried man who is suffering from problems at work, then this vision is good news for him that he will get rid of all these problems and find a new job in which he feels comfortable and reassured. If the dreamer sees that he is killing cockroaches in a dream by shooting them, this is evidence On the good changes that will occur in his life and will change it for the better, or that he will receive a gift from someone close to him and he will feel joy and improve his psychological state. Interpretation of the dream of killing a cockroach by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that dreaming of cockroaches in a dream generally indicates that the dreamer is surrounded by a large group. From enemies and individuals who are trying to destroy his life. If a person sees cockroaches trying to attack him, this indicates that he will be exposed to many crises in the coming period. As Ibn Sirin said, the dream of killing cockroaches and getting rid of them is one of the dreams that indicate goodness, and it symbolizes the end of the problems and worries that he suffered. Including the one who had the vision, and that he will enjoy great psychological comfort and unlimited stability. When a person in a dream tries to kill a cockroach but is unable to do so, this is evidence that he is seeking to end what is bothering him and his days. Interpretation of a dream about killing a cockroach according to Nabul. Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream could be a sign The fortuneteller is exposed to envy from people, but by saying the supplications and repeating the legal ruqyah, he knows the envious eye in reality, and God knows best. Seeing a cockroach and taking it out in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get rid of the problems and envy that afflicted the dreamer in reality, and God knows best. Also, the dream of cockroaches coming out of A drain in a person’s dream indicates that he has been afflicted with witchcraft and evil by someone, so the dreamer should seek help from God Almighty, and God knows best. Seeing the appearance of cockroaches in large numbers symbolizes that the dreamer will fall into a series of successive problems that harm and harm him, but soon the anxiety and sadness will go away. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about killing a cockroach for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a cockroach on one side of her room, in the kitchen Or on her bed, it means that she will go through many obstacles and problems that stand as an impenetrable barrier in the process of achieving her goals. .If this girl is engaged

title: Interpretation of Surat Al-Qaf in a dream - Seeing reading Surat Al-Qaf in a dream

preview.html: The dream of Surah Q for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married man and a single young man, either writing it, reading, or listening to the recitation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Surah Q in Manamasura Q is one of the Meccan surahs that was revealed to the Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace - Before the Hijra, except for verse No. 38, which is 45 verses, which is Surah No. 50. In the order of the surahs of the Holy Qur’an, and No. 34 in the order in which the surahs were revealed to the Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace - and it was revealed after Surat Al-Mursalat and before Surah Al-Surah. Country, which is in the twenty-sixth part of the order of the Holy Qur’an, Surah Q was given this name because it begins with the letter Q, and this is similar to some other surahs of Surah Q. The message comes the following verse that talks about the miracle of the Holy Qur’an, such as: (S and the Holy Qur’an) and in the words of God Almighty:) It was narrated that the Jews said: God - the Most High - created man and the universe in only six days and then rested on Saturday, which is a day of rest for them, so God announced God Almighty said: Abdullah bin Abbas, may God be pleased with them, narrated: “The Jews came to the Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - and asked about the creation of the heavens and the earth, and he said: ‘God Almighty created. He created the earth on Sunday and Monday, created the mountains on Tuesday and their benefits, on Wednesday created the trees, water created the sky on Thursday, and on Friday created the stars, sun, and moon. The Jews said: Then what, Muhammad? He said: Then he ascended the throne. They said: She would have been right if she had finished and then relaxed. Then the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace - became angry. With great seriousness, he revealed: (Indeed, We created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days, and no darkness has touched us, so be patient over what they say). It was reported on the authority of the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace - that he used to pray a lot of the surah, especially in the dawn prayer, until he memorized it. Many companions narrated from him, as narrated by Umm Hisham bin Haritha. Bin Al-Numan, may God be pleased with her, said: (I only memorized what was in the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace - who delivers the sermon every Friday. He said. Our enlightenment and the enlightenment of the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace - was one. The Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - was praying. The surah in Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha prayers. Khattab - may God be pleased with him - asked Abu Waqid Al-Laithi - may God be pleased with him - what the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace - used to recite on Eid al-Adha and Eid al-Fitr, and he said: He used to recite it (the Qur’an and the Holy Qur’an). And (The Hour has approached and the moon has split.) It includes creation, resurrection, resurrection, and reckoning, and a speech about reward and punishment, and its verses for both encouragement and intimidation. Many commentators say that Surah Qaf is the beginning of Al-Mufassal in the Holy Qur’an, and Al-Mufassal is the short surah of the Qur’an in which many surahs are composed. With the Basmala. Whoever sees, hears or reads Surah S in a dream, dreaming about it is a sign of salvation from distress and hardship, God willing. Seeing Surah YouTube

In the order of the surahs of the Holy Qur’an and number 34 in the order of the revelation of the surahs to the Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace - and it was revealed after Surah Al-Mursalat and before Surah Al-Balad, and it is in the twenty-sixth part of the order of the Holy Qur’an Surah Q was named by this name because it begins with the letter Q, and this is similar to some other surahs of Surah S. The message comes the following verse that talks about the miracle of the Holy Quran such as: (S. By the Holy Quran) and in the saying of Allah Almighty:) It was narrated that the Jews said: Allah - the Most High - created man and the universe in only six days and then rested on Saturday, which is a day of rest for them, so Allah Almighty announced His saying: Abdullah bin Abbas, may Allah be pleased with them both, narrated: “The Jews came to the Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - and asked about the creation of the heavens and the earth, so he said: “Allah Almighty created the earth on Sunday and Monday, and created the mountains on Tuesday and their benefits, and on Wednesday He created the trees, and created the water and the sky on Thursday, and on Friday He created the stars, the sun and the moon. The Jews said: Then what, O Muhammad? He said: Then he ascended the throne. They said: It would have been right if it had finished and then rested, so the Messenger of Allah - may God bless him and grant him peace - became angry. And with great seriousness, he revealed: (And indeed, We created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days, and no darkness touched Us, so be patient over what they say). It was reported from the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace - that he used to pray a lot in the Surah, especially in the dawn prayer, until many of the Companions memorized it from him, as narrated by Umm Hisham bin Haritha. Ibn Al-Nu'man, may God be pleased with him, said: (I have only memorized what is in the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace - who preaches every Friday, he said. And our enlightenment and the enlightenment of the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace - were one. The Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - used to pray the surah in the Eid Al-Fitr and Eid Al-Adha prayers. Khattab - may God be pleased with him - asked Abu Waqid Al-Laithi - may God be pleased with him - about what the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace - used to recite on Eid Al-Adha and Eid Al-Fitr. He said: He used to recite in it (S and the Holy Quran) and (The Hour has drawn near and the moon has split). It includes creation, resurrection, resurrection and accountability, and the speech of reward and punishment, and its verses are for encouragement and intimidation alike. Many interpreters say that Surat Qaf is the beginning of the Mufassal in the Holy Quran, and the Mufassal is the short surah of the Quran in which many surahs are formed with the Basmalah. Whoever sees, hears or reads Surat S in a dream, the dream in it is a sign of salvation from distress and hardship, God willing. Seeing Surat YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of dreams about fishing with a rod for a married woman, and interpretation of dreams about fishing by hand for a married woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman? Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman in a dream Its meaning depends on the type of fish being caught, its size and number, and the way the dreamer follows fishing has a precise meaning that cannot be ignored and until you discover more evidence follow the article below. You have a dream that confuses you that you are waiting for .. Google, an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman. Her offspring can interpret fishing in a dream for a married woman. If she catches a fish in her dream, knowing that she is newly married and awaiting news of pregnancy, then the vision in this case means pregnancy for the girl. But if a woman sees in her dream that she is catching a lot of fish, then she will not give birth to a single child, but rather God has blessed her with many boys and girls. If you see that it took a long time to catch a fish in a dream, this means that pregnancy is late or the dream shows that livelihood and money have been postponed for a period of time. If she sees her only son catching a fish and she is satisfied with it, then she is his future wife and he will live a peaceful and conflict-free life with her, In addition to the beautiful features that distinguish this girl in terms of religiosity and cheerfulness. He will receive abundant food immediately after marrying her. When she sees in a dream that her husband catches a lot of fish and gives it to her to cook, this means a lot of money and goodness that he earns from his work and he will give it to his wife. And children. But when a married woman sees her husband catching a fish and eating it in a dream, the dream is not promising and indicates his second marriage. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer catches a fish in a dream and notices that it is covered with many scales, then this is a good vision and an indication of protection from deception. People and the lies of hypocrites. If she sees her unmarried daughters catching fish, then they are about to bid farewell to celibacy and enter a new stage, which is marriage, and the vision indicates that these girls will be born shortly after marriage. When she catches a fish in a dream that is of a small size, her life is simple and not sufficient. In her life, there is no doubt that the weak economic level of any person makes him fall into the circle of sorrows and worries due to demands. From life you always need a lot of money, and Ibn Sirin said that catching small fish for a married woman portends that she is very sick. What did Ibn Sirin say about the interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman? Interpretation of a dream about fishing with a hook for a married womanIf the dreamer sees that she is holding a hook in her hand and sitting in a place Close to the sea and fishing, the vision shows her patience, she is characterized by thoughtfulness, careful thinking and wisdom. He is inadequate in caring for them, and gives them material and moral attention, and he can recover from the disease if he contracted it in this previous period. And if she sits in front of the sea for a long time until she catches the fish she needs to feed her children, then she is a woman who sacrifices herself and may suffer a lot of pain and pressure in order to make her happy. Her family members. If she sees the stick broken or stolen, this indicates loss and loss, and if she catches fish

title: Secrets of interpretation of combing hair in a dream for single, pregnant and married women (dream of combing hair)

preview.html: In this article, we present to you cutting hair in a dream for a single woman, the meaning of a hairstyle in a dream for single women, pregnant women, married women, and men according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi in detail. Hair is a woman's jewel and crown, and there is no girl or woman who does not care about her hair and tries to make it bright and lively to appear in the best way, and a girl can see it in her dream. That she is combing her hair or that someone is combing her hair. We will explain to you in the following article what the interpretation of combing hair is, according to what the great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin mentioned in his book “Interpretation of Dreams.” The sleeper says in his dream that he is combing his hair, or that he is using a gold comb, or he sees that his hair is falling out while combing it, and when the dreamer wakes up and remembers this vision, he wants to interpret it, find out its true meaning in detail. The social position of the viewer, and for this reason we will explain to you through the following paragraphs of the encyclopedia the interpretation of a dream about a hairstyle for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, so follow us. Haircut in a dream for a single woman. The researcher in the field of dream interpretation, Ibn Sirin, believes that seeing an unmarried woman combing her hair in a dream is good news. To fulfill a long-awaited desire of the dreamer, which could be a suitable husband or an opportunity to travel. Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl dreams that she is holding a wooden comb and styling her hair, the dream indicates that she will get married soon and will be happy with her husband, and the vision symbolizes that the dreamer is Religious and characterized by high morals. Another interpretation of a single woman combing her hair with a wooden comb in a dream is that the dreamer has friends who have good morals and love to see her happy and well-mannered. One of the dreams that an unmarried girl dreams is that she is holding an iron comb and combing her hair with it. Seeing an unmarried girl holding a comb Of ivory and combing her hair with it in a dream means that the dreamer will reach a high position in her work or that she will succeed in her field of study. Whoever sees in her dream that she is combing her very long hair, this means that what the dreamer desires will be delayed for some time. An unmarried girl’s dream that she is combing A young woman’s hair indicates her engagement, and if she is engaged, the vision shows her marriage contract. An unmarried girl combing her hair with a plastic comb means that the dreamer will enter into new relationships and find someone to help and support her. Among the interpretations of a dream of an unmarried woman combing her hair with a plastic comb is her marriage to a generous person. And she will be happy with him in her life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that one of her friends gave her a comb as a gift, then the dream is good news for her that her marriage is imminent. Seeing an unmarried woman’s hair falling out while combing it in a dream indicates the woman’s feeling of fading emotions. Meaning of the symbol Combing hair in a dream for a single woman: Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is combing her hair using a wooden comb, this is a sign that she will meet a new friend, and this vision may indicate that the dreamer will meet. A young man wants to marry her. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is combing

Meaning of the symbol Combing hair in a dream for a single woman: Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is combing her hair using a wooden comb, this is a sign that she will meet a new friend, and this vision may indicate that the dreamer will meet.
